message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a mechanism for improving performance in per-pixel labeling tasks using deep convolutional networks. This is a common problem in computer vision, which suggests that cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The proposed mechanism involves learning to selectively process a subset of spatial locations at each layer of the network, which involves machine learning techniques and suggests that cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. The paper also evaluates the proposed mechanism on a variety of tasks, including semantic segmentation, boundary detection, monocular depth, and surface normal estimation, which suggests that cs.NE and cs.CL are also possible sub-categories.
